title: NFL Mock Draft Monday: Examining Ryan Wilson's Big Board with 0 Quarterbacks in Top 25 (Football 3/30)
description:
Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson are back for another Mock Draft Monday to focus on Ryan's Big Board. There are always discrepancies between mocks and big boards and that's what we examine on this episode. First, the quarterbacks. While Wilson has 2 QBs being selected in his latest mock, he doesn't have any ranked inside the Top 25 on his big board. The guys then focus on the top of the draft including a slip for Kayvon Thibodeaux and recent rise for Travon Walker and much more. 

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
